pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible Data Simulation Using the Multivariate Normal Distribution // Simulation of data from Gaussian Graphical Models (B Bodinier, S Filippi, TH Nost, J Chiquet, M Chadeau- Hyam (2021) arXiv:2106.02521). By controlling the conditional independence structure between the variables, these multivariate simulation tools can be used to evaluate the performance of regression, dimensionality reduction or graphical models.
